lead_paragraph: Newcastle United need to start getting the "fine margins" right if they are to climb out of the Premier League relegation zone, goalkeeper Rob Elliot said after Saturday's 1-0 loss to leaders Arsenal.

headline.print_headline: Newcastle Need to Get 'Fine Margins' Right, Says Elliot
headline.main: Newcastle Need to Get 'Fine Margins' Right, Says Elliot

snippet: Newcastle United need to start getting the "fine margins" right if they are to climb out of the Premier League relegation zone, goalkeeper Rob Elliot said after Saturday's 1-0 loss to leaders Arsenal....
